mstickerlib0.3.0

Module sticker_formats

Module Items

  • Modules

In mstickerlib::matrix

mstickerlib::matrix

Module sticker_formats

Source
Expand description

Current different StickerPack formats exists for Matrix. This mod store all current supported formats.

Modulesยง

maunium
Stickerpacks for the maunium stickerpicker, which can be used at matrix clients whitch use the current sticker format, like Element and SchildiChat. The maunium stickerpicker does fully replace the default stickerpicker.
ponies
Ponies(MSC2545) are the new upcomming matrix sticker standard. They allow room and personal stickerpacks. This is already supported by many matrix clients like Neko, Cinny, Fluffychat and more. Keep in mind that ponies specification is not stable yet.
